about_the_game:
Begin your Journey!

The Misfits is a Medieval Fantasy RPG heavily influenced by narrative storytelling. With an isometric view and visuals inspired by classic Western CRPGs, it combines this style with turn-based combat reminiscent of side-view JRPGs. The relationships between party members will shape every aspect of their development—whether during battles or in the unfolding of missions.

In search of a Purpose!

The Conjurers' War for an Ancestral Power spreads across the world of Vaghata, reigniting old alliances and rivalries, and affecting everyone—but none more so than the innocent.

You will guide Kharys, an exiled half-elf warrior, as he travels through the kingdoms with a group of adventurers—all of them Misfits. Together, they take on missions for those in need, searching for meaning in their lives that makes every battle they've endured worthwhile.

Your decisions will alter the narrative, leading them down easy or treacherous paths, forging new allies or enemies, and resolving situations through intense battles, diplomacy, or subterfuge.

Under the watchful eyes of unknown entities and their minions, who seek to manipulate reality in their struggle for control over the Universe.

Value your Relationships!

Throughout his journey, Kharys will be joined by remarkable companions, each with their own stories, specialties, and unique skills. These allies will stand by his side in battle or help manage camp resources.

As relationships deepen, his companions can provide powerful buffs in combat and grant reputation bonuses for skill tests along the journey.

However, Kharys’s decisions and how he treats his companions can cause them to question their goals, defying his commands during combat and even leaving the group during the course of the story. As a leader, Kharys must resolve personal issues and internal conflicts within the party, which can drastically affect mission outcomes.

Even so, there will always be opportunities to meet new characters during missions and recruit them as needed.

Take care of your reputation, and who knows—you might just build a powerful army of Misfits!

Features:

  • Your Journey, Your Choices: A great RPG allows players to decide how to approach situations and experience the full weight of their consequences.

  • Reach Your Potential: Earn experience through combat to level up your party and shape their attributes based on your dialogue choices. Between missions, upgrade your equipment and weapons to make them more versatile and powerful.

  • Strategic Turn-Based Combat: Lead your companions, each with unique skills and combat styles, and take advantage of the strengths and weaknesses of every strike, weapon type, or conjuration. Master the battlefield by carefully choosing your combatants for maximum impact in each mission.

  • Combat, Diplomacy or Subterfuge: Choose how to approach each situation—face challenges head-on in combat, negotiate for peace, or use alternative methods to outwit your enemies.

  • Skill Tests: Some situations require a bit of luck, so improve your Attributes and roll the dice.

  • Take Care of Yours: Kharys's reputation with his companions affects the group with buffs or debuffs, potentially turning the tide in combat. It also plays a crucial role in managing conflicts within the party. Listen to their concerns and lend a hand—or ignore their struggles and face the consequences.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes and text that some people may find disturbing. They are not graphically detailed and presented from an isometric point of view, and most of them occur episodically (if you play certain branches of the game), however, I consider it my duty to inform my players about them.
